hubertsoft.description: ✅ Default — balanced, efficient, great for both singing and speech

vec256l9.description: Lightweight alternative — faster, slightly lower quality than hubertsoft

vec256l12.description: Deeper 12-layer version — still compact, a bit richer than l9

vec768l9.description: Higher dimensional — captures more nuance, slower

vec768l12.description: Heavyweight — best detail for complex singing styles, most compute-intensive

whisper-ppg.description: Multilingual support, very clear for speech transcription tasks

whisper-ppg-large.description: Larger Whisper — more robust features, slower & heavier

cnhubertlarge.description: Optimized for Chinese speech, but generalizable to English too

dphubert.description: Differentially private HuBERT — for privacy-sensitive data

wavlmbase+.description: Microsoft WavLM — good robustness in noisy conditions
